body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Bardstown, Kentucky native. Married to Sophronia Rizer Muir. Father of Bell Muir, Thomas R. Muir, Sydney S. Muir, Upton W. Muir, Lilian Muir, Nellie Muir, and Sophronia Muir. Graduated from Hanover College and practiced law in Bardstown, Kentucky. Began practicing in partnership with Thomas Riley in Louisville in 1852. Became Circuit Judge of the Fifth Judicial District in 1858.
